itunes:title: Talking Book Influencing + Latest Reads Galore with Dennis From Scaredstraightreads!
title: Talking Book Influencing + Latest Reads Galore with Dennis From Scaredstraightreads!
description:
In Episode 64 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are joined by popular Bookstagrammer Dennis from Scaredstraightreads.Â  They share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about the world of book influencingÂ 

**If you enjoy the podcast, please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, + our ALL NEW CRIMINALLY BOOKED! Plus, we host fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour +Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons for just $5 a month!
